title: Beers, Burgers, and Bergs: How ‘Opening Weekend’ Sets the Scene for the Spring Classics
content:
Omloop Het Nieuwsblad is the traditional opener of the Belgian calendar, and marks the first salvo of the glorious run of the spring classics.

Read the full article at Beers, Burgers, and Bergs: How ‘Opening Weekend’ Sets the Scene for the Spring Classics on Velo.
author: ahood
